GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: uvc: fix list double add in uvcg_video_pump

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit d95ac8b920de1d39525fadc408ce675697626ca6, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit f9897ec0f6d34e8b2bc2f4c8ab8789351090f3d2. For more details please see the references link.
